title: Taliban troops fire into the air, beat back crowds outside Kabul airport
content:
1. Taliban troops fire into the air, beat back crowds outside Kabul airport  New York Post
  2. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin says US will look for every way possible to get people to Kabul airport  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Biden's national security adviser says ISIS threat against Kabul airport is 'real' and 'acute'  CNN
  4. Opinion | Yes, the Kabul withdrawal is a disaster. But Biden made the right decision on Afghanistan.  The Washington Post
  5. Heart-breaking stories of Afghanistan, via Modesto  Modesto Bee
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: カブール空港の外で、タリバン軍が空に向かって発砲し、群衆を撃退する
